bibl.title: Late Antique Textiles of the Benaki Museum with Bucolic and Mythological Iconography. Avec résumé en anglais.
Europe, Hellas and Egypt: Complementary Antipodes during Late Antiquity. Papers from Session IV.3, Held at the European Association of Archaeologists Eighth Annual Meeting in Thessaloniki 2002
bibl.author: TSOURINAKI, Sophia

bibl.note: Textiles from the Benaki Museum, Athens, with Dionysiac scenes. The figures of Acc. 7242 and 7244 preserve their names in Greek (6th-7th cent. C.E.).
TSOURINAKI Sophia, Late Antique Textiles of the Benaki Museum with Bucolic and Mythological Iconography. Avec résumé en anglais.

Amanda-Alice MARAVELIA (Ed.), Europe, Hellas and Egypt: Complementary Antipodes during Late Antiquity. Papers from Session IV.3, Held at the European Association of Archaeologists Eighth Annual Meeting in Thessaloniki 2002 = BAR International Series. 1218 (Oxford, 2004) pp. 51-66, 3 pll. n./bl., 7 pll. coul.
